availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William O. Chalfant (Mason County, KY, postmaster)

body.p: Born in Kentucky. Married to Mary K. Chalfant. Father of Mary Chalfant. Appointed postmaster of Dover on November 3, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28, p. 137.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Minerva, p. 465A.
